T02D1952:77a-1: kri shna ya m'a ri s'a dha n'am mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1952:77b-0: gshin rje gshed nag po'i @77b sgrub thabs kyi mandala gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1952:77b-1: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1952:77b-2: bla ma rdo rje ye shes dang //
T02D1952:77b-3: rje btsun mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1952:77b-4: dngos grub slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir //
T02D1952:77b-5: rje btsun dkyil 'khor dam pa yi //
T02D1952:77b-6: cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D1952:77b-7: yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su ;
T02D1952:77b-8: / sa gzhi bzang po yid 'ong la //
T02D1952:77b-9: rin chen spos chus legs bkrus te //
T02D1952:77b-10: mnyam pa'i sa la dri sogs sbyin //
T02D1952:77b-11: mdzes pa'i gzhi la thig le bzhag / t'a ma la yi 'o ma'am //
T02D1952:77b-12: ras bal gtsang mas dgod par bya //
T02D1952:77b-13: sems can kun la rjes brtse bas //
T02D1952:77b-14: phyi nang khrus la gnas nas kyang ;
T02D1952:77b-15: / skad cig bskyed la tshogs bsag bya //
T02D1952:77b-16: srung dang chos 'byung gzhal yas khang //
T02D1952:77b-17: bskyed la de yi nang du ni //
T02D1952:77b-18: me tog bzang po dgram par bya //
T02D1952:77b-19: zhe sdang rdo rje las brtsams te //
T02D1952:77b-20: ral gri rdo rje rab tu bskyed //
T02D1952:77b-21: tshom bu re la lan bdun te //
T02D1952:77b-22: bzlas pa padma nyi zla'i steng //
T02D1952:77b-23: bde gshegs sras bcas bsam par bya //
T02D1952:77b-24: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1952:77b-25: aom dzin dzi ka / aom ratna dhr'ika / aom
T02D1952:77b-26: a'a ro lik / aom pradzny'a dhrik / aom mudga
T02D1952:77b-27: ra dhrik / aom danda dhrik / aom padma dhrik
T02D1952:77b-28: / aom khadga dhrik / aom mo ha ra ti
T02D1952:77b-32: so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang //
T02D1952:77b-33: rgyan dang bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02D1952:77b-34: mngon par rtogs pa'i cho ga las //
T02D1952:77b-35: 'byung ba bzhin du gsal bar bskyed //
T02D1952:77b-36: tshogs bsags dkyil 'khor bstim pa dang //
T02D1952:77b-37: skye mched sku gsung thugs byin brlab //
T02D1952:77b-38: dbang blang ba dang dgug gzhug bya //
T02D1952:77b-39: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang //
T02D1952:77b-40: spro bsdu dang ni bzlas pa rnams //
T02D1952:77b-41: rnal 'byor pa yis legs byas te //
T02D1952:77b-42: 'dod pa'i don rnams gsol ba gdab //
T02D1952:77b-43: gshegs dang bzod pa gsol byas te //
T02D1952:77b-44: de nyid gsum gyi cho ga yis //
T02D1952:77b-45: ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol //
T02D1952:77b-46: dam tshig bskyed pa'i lha rnams ni //
T02D1952:77b-47: snying ga nyid du rnam par bstim //
T02D1952:77b-48: gnyis don dam pa bden pa yi //
T02D1952:77b-49: chos kyi tshul la gnas par bya //
T02D1952:77b-50: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1952:77b-51: byang chub tu ni bsngo ba dang //
T02D1952:77b-52: smon lam chen po gdab par bya //
T02D1952:77b-53: de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu //
T02D1952:77b-54: snying brtse brtson pas dbul bar bya //
T02D1952:78a-3: sbyor ba'i cho ga sngon song bas //
T02D1952:78a-4: gser dang pad zla rnam bsams te //
T02D1952:78a-5: gong bzhin rim par dgod par bya //
T02D1952:78a-12: bsnyen par bya ba'i gong bzhin du //
T02D1952:78a-13: gshegs su gsol dang bsdu ba min //
T02D1952:78a-14: khyad par bsdus pa'i mandala ni //
T02D1952:78a-15: las kyi sngags kyis byin brlabs te //
T02D1952:78a-16: mdzes pa'i sngags kyis dgram par bya //
T02D1952:78a-17: ras sam bzang po'i gzhi dag la //
T02D1952:78a-18: thig le 'bru sogs bkod nas kyang //
T02D1952:78a-19: bde gshegs sras bcas spyan drangs te //
T02D1952:78a-20: gdan gyi tshul du dbul bar bya //
T02D1952:78a-21: shin tu bsdus pa 'di lta ste //
T02D1952:78a-22: tshom bu gcig la mngon brten te //
T02D1952:78a-23: gzhal yas khang du dmigs nas kyang //
T02D1952:78a-24: de nas spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1952:78a-25: bsod nams tshogs kyis rgyud sbyangs nas //
T02D1952:78a-26: gsol btab bsngos la gshegs su gsol //
T02D1952:78a-27: ma chags brten pa'i snying gar bsdu //
T02D1952:78a-28: sgyu ma'i blo yis zin par bya //
T02D1952:78a-29: bla na med pa'i mandala ni //
T02D1952:78a-30: snying ga'i padma rnam dag nang //
T02D1952:78a-31: ye shes chen po'i thig le ni //
T02D1952:78a-32: lnga phrag gnyis dang drug phyed kyi //
T02D1952:78a-33: yig 'bru mchog tu rnam bsams te //
T02D1952:78a-34: mtshan dang rdzogs pa'i skur gyur nas //
T02D1952:78a-35: dus gsum tshogs kyi mchod ba bya //
T02D1952:78a-36: rtag tu bsdu ba ma yin te //
T02D1952:78a-37: dus med rtag tu brtson pas 'grub //
T02D1952:78a-38: bsam gyis mi khyab mandala ni //
T02D1952:78a-39: chos nyid zung du 'jug pa las //
T02D1952:78a-40: rang gi de nyid rnam bsams pa'i //
T02D1952:78a-41: skye mched mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas //
T02D1952:78a-42: rtog dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid //
T02D1952:78a-43: rdo rje lta bu'i pho brang yin //
T02D1952:78a-44: dus gsum rtag tu sangs rgyas nas //
T02D1952:78a-45: skye med de bzhin nyid kyis bdag / chags sdang bral bas dbul bar bya //
T02D1952:78a-46: mandala kun gyi mchog yin no //
T02D1952:78a-47: bsod nams tshogs kyi mandala las //
T02D1952:78a-48: ye shes mandala rnam par skye //
T02D1952:78a-49: de phyir thabs kyi mandala ni //
T02D1952:78a-50: rnal 'byor ba yis dbul bar bya //
T02D1952:78a-51: thun mong dngos grub bsgrub pa dang //
T02D1952:78a-52: mchog gi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02D1952:78a-53: bdag gi bsam pa bzang po yis //
T02D1952:78a-54: mandala byas pa'i dge ba gang //
T02D1952:78a-55: des ni sems can thams cad kyis //
T02D1952:78a-56: sangs rgyas zhing khams dag thob shog / gshin rje
T02D1952:78b-0: gshed nag po'i sgrub @78b thabs kyi mandala gyi cho
T02D1952:78b-1: ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D1952:78b-3: // / zangs gling rnal 'byor n'a ga p'u ra yis //
T02D1952:78b-4: rnal 'byor ka ma rakshi ta nyid la //
T02D1952:78b-5: gu tsha rgyal bu'i bu nyid btang nas kyang //
T02D1952:78b-6: ta ru pa ri dur khrod tshal nyid du //
T02D1952:78b-7: rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo nang //
T02D1952:78b-8: gsol btab rnal 'byor rnams kyi zhal ngo ru //
T02D1952:78b-9: mandala cho ga bsod snyoms pa yis byas //
T02D1952:78b-10: deng sang rnal 'byor lta spyod ldan pa yis //
